title: Amazing feeling
text: I really loved the restaurant in the top floor. The main dish with the pork was amazing!!!! yummy!! Valentina and Ignacio and everyone was really smiling and welcoming! Amazing place to go and relax! i will definitely go back!!!

title: Very cosy
text: It's new but it's so cool and cosy .. I love the lobby and I love the service. Andrea is so keen to assist you always! It will be on my top list when I am nearby there always. The area is nice too and very alternative..

title: amazing
text: and Csaba is simple one of the best. i really like the view the service the food all amazing. i will def go back! Thank you Csaba!

title: Nice Hotel
text: I loved it. It was so nice. the rooms so clean and nice and staff was amazing. Marcel is a real asset to the Hsk team and to Hyatt The Churchill in general. i will definitely stay again when i will have a chance!

title: Nice Service
text: the foods is fine the prices are fine but Silvia was amazing. she might be not the manager yet but i m sure its coming!

title: very nice hotel
text: from the moment you enter this hotel you are greeted with a warm welcome.Its not stuffy like other 5 * hotels in London and you are not looked upon like scum if you have jeans on! Would definitely stay again easily the best hotel I have stayed in, in London. 3 minutes walk from Tube station and approx 10 minutes walk from Piccadilly and 10 minutes from Knightsbridge. Concierge are fantastic and cannot do enough to help.nice hotel, nice people, nice area! Thank you Simon for your great help!

title: Good
text: Very nice after 6pm ... Nice service bit noisy .. ok coffee... No easy wifi .. ok toilet could be bit better .. expensive parasols ... Excellent sea water....

title: I LOVE THE GALAKTOMPOUREKO
text: i love the galaktompoureko.. when i m in athens i go and i eat at lease one piece per day!!! its ok price

title: impressive
text: very nice very impressive.. amazing view ... and nice atmosphere . athens view super!! could have toilet....

title: impressive
text: nice view from there ... u can see amazing athens ... so nice atmosphere... u should go ... no toilet but ok ...

title: i love this place.... please please extend your closing time ...
text: i love this place.... please please extend your closing time till midnight ... for us who work at hotels receptions :):):) plz... .

title: Basic but Good!
text: I liked that i could connect the tv with my pc. ! good hotel .. staff could be a bit more friendly. but ok! the area was not the best. i like Athens. you got many choices and friendly people that are not in time stress!

title: 2nd time, it s just ok!
text:
No comfortable shower, wc in general, no the best area, no tv connections, ok staff, small room, early brkfst, ....
I like Athens. choices and no time stress! Enjoying the good weather and the food tastes.

title: Great area, central
text: Easy going area, hot point, drink, eat, relax, live music, theaters, events, close to thiseio monastiraki, ...

title: Impressed from Greek History once more
text: Large, quiet, central, multi, easy. they have offers sometimes so may u not pay for the visit, although deserves it.!

title: No customers friendly policies
text:
Maybe u r waiting for ur order although u gave it first. the sorry policy is not enough if the business wants to be a good restaurant!
Visiting it many times!

title: Posh
text: no something special. good prices offers. no special menu. strange atmosphere. no friendly - greek gay attitude!
